well=C2=A0I hope your wrong to Snow..but Spirit never has lied to me. So I'=
m afraid 
you may not be. you did what you could do you called in and gave =
the info. 
Hopfully he will be found or the person who took him




_______=

From: "SnowfireL@..." <SnowfireL@...>
To:=
 EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Tue, July 27, 2010 1:04:27 PM
Subject: Re: [=
EVP-ITC] Re: depressing,

=C2=A0 
Well, i told my daughter about it, and i =
did call it in this morning, i hope 
they find the child alive, and i am wr=
ong, but everyone on the other side, says 
the child was murdered, one said=
 it was some guy that had been hanging around 
the camp grounds that day, a=
nd left, but he came back at night, have no idea how 
he got the little kid=
 out of a tent with 4 or 5 sleeping people in it, if that's 
what it was, d=
on't know, one spirit voice said it is a "pedefile"

and "we know him" is w=
hat they said, some lower spirits, told me what he did to 
the little kid, =
it was sick and can't repeat it here, his body is under a tree 
some where =
covered up with some dirt, if i heard that right.=C2=A0 I don't think his 
=
body is still in the camp area though.=C2=A0 But, yes, i called it in as a =

premonition dream i had, i have no idea how to try to explain boxes.=C2=A0=
 Thanking 
the spirit world for all their help in finding the guy that did =
this horrible 
thing to a little toddler still in diapers. sf

-----Origina=
l Message-----
From: Rj <rasterer@yahoo. com>
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com
=
Sent: Tue, Jul 27, 2010 1:36 pm
Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: depressing,


=
=C2=A0 
You asked several questions, so I'll take them one at a time:

1) y=
ou hope what? that i made a fool out of myself or that i called it in or 
p=
erhaps both?=C2=A0 


I hope you called it in. Your resistance to giving th=
e police information you 
said you thought you had on a child abductor, eve=
n after several prompts, makes 
me hope you did call it in, and didn't just=
 say that to stop me from prompting 
you. I don't know of course, I am not =
there. I have no desire that you make a 
fool of yourself, but if it helps =
save a child from am abductor, I think it 
would be worth it.

2) Why don't=
 you get on the box, and do some asking? 

As I have said in the past, my e=
xperience with those boxes has shown me nothing 
paranormal yet.=C2=A0 Howe=
ver, people continue to say there is more to it than my 
experience.=C2=A0 =
And so, I am keeping an open mind and trying to examine the 
evidence you p=
rovide.

3) Why are negative people on these lists anyway. if you guys don'=
t believe in 
this type of technology, why the heck are you all here? 


If=
 I had absolulely no belief that there might be something interesting going=
 on 
with the technology, I would not have been so insistent that you give =
your 
information to the police.=C2=A0 How could a person, of good conscien=
ce, not prompt 
you to give that information to the police?=C2=A0 Again how=
 is that a negative thing 
to do?

Wouldn't the really negative thing be to=
 ignore it?

<DIV style=3D"FONT-FAMILY: arial; COLOR: black; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">Well, i=
 told my daughter about it, and i did call it in this morning, i hope they =
find the child alive, and i am wrong, but everyone on the other side, says =
the child was murdered, one said it was some guy that had been hanging arou=
nd the camp grounds that day, and left, but he came back at night, have no =
idea how he got the little kid out of a tent with 4 or 5 sleeping people in=
 it, if that's what it was, don't know, one spirit voice said it is a "pede=
file"<BR></DIV>
<DIV>and "we know him" is what they said, some lower spirit=
s, told me what he did to the little kid, it was sick and can't repeat it h=
ere, his body is under a tree some where covered up with some dirt, if i he=
ard that right.  I don't think his body is still in the camp area thou=
gh.  But, yes, i called it in as a premonition dream i had, i have no =
idea how to try to explain boxes.  Thanking the spirit world for all t=
heir help in finding the guy that did this horrible thing to a little toddl=
er still in diapers. sf<BR></DIV>

 vAlign=3Dtop>You asked several questions, so I'll take them one at a time:=
<BR><BR>1) you hope what? that i made a fool out of myself or that i called=
 it in or perhaps both?  <BR><BR>I hope you called it in. Your resista=
nce to giving the police information you said you thought you had on a chil=
d abductor, even after several prompts, makes me hope you did call it in, a=
nd didn't just say that to stop me from prompting you. I don't know of cour=
se, I am not there. I have no desire that you make a fool of yourself, but =
if it helps save a child from am abductor, I think it would be worth it.<BR=
><BR>2) Why don't you get on the box, and do some asking? <BR><BR>As I have=
 said in the past, my experience with those boxes has shown me nothing para=
normal yet.  However, people continue to say there is more to it than =
my experience.  And so, I am keeping an open mind and trying to examin=
e the evidence you provide.<BR><BR>3) Why are negative people on
 these lis=
ts anyway. if you guys don't believe in this type of technology, why the he=
ck are you all here? <BR><BR>If I had absolulely no belief that there might=
 be something interesting going on with the technology, I would not have be=
en so insistent that you give your information to the police.  How cou=
ld a person, of good conscience, not prompt you to give that information to=
 the police?  Again how is that a negative thing to do?<BR><BR>Wouldn'=
t the really negative thing be to ignore it?<BR><BR><BR><BR><BR><BR>--- On =

I don't think you should lie to the police.  If you have information o=
n a missing child, call and tell them.  Especially if it might help ke=
ep another child safe, especially if you are wrong and they don't pick him =
up 'soon enough'.<BR><BR>--- On <B>Tue, 7/27/10, SnowfireL@aol. com <I><=

<TBODY>
<TR>
<TD vAlign=3Dtop>When you labe=
l the files with what you heard, you influence the listener to try to hear =
what you heard, rather than what they hear with no hints.  So if you w=
ant to know what people really hear without your hints, you need to send th=
em out unlabeled.<BR><BR><BR>--- On <B>Tue, 7/27/10, SnowfireL@aol. com <I>=

<TD vAlign=
=3Dtop><BR>If there is a chance you might be able to stop this Morgan perso=

portant things on the line than personal ego (I hope).<BR><BR><BR><BR>--- O=
